page.title: 18YOUNG PEOPLE'S CLUBS
page.content:
Langley Vale clubs for youngsters:
{Playgroup (3-5 years) Monday - Friday 9.15 a.m.-11.45 a.m. {Brownies Monday 6.00 p.m. - 7.30 p.m. {School's Short Tennis Tuesday 1.30 p.m. - 3.15 p.m. {Cubs Tuesday 7.00 p.m. - 8.30 p.m. {Epsom Downs Youth Club Wednesday 6.30 p.m. - 9.30 p.m. {Langley Vale Youth Club Wednesday 9.30 p.m. - 10.30 p.m. {Junior Youth Club Thursday 5.00 p.m. - 6.30 p.m. {Junior Dance School Thursday 2.30 p.m. - 4.30 p.m. {Guides Friday 6.00 p.m. - 8.00 p.m. {Sunday School Sunday 9.30 a.m. - 10.30 a.m.
